children.text: Grab a cold beverage and hot sandwich and relax with a scenic view of the trails. Enjoy local apr√®s entertainment every Friday and Saturday.
A variety of grilled items, snacks, ice cream, beer, soft drinks, coffee and cocoa. Serving breakfast & lunch on the main level of the Main Base Lodge.

The Sam Bar is a craft beer bar serving draft and packaged beer, signature cocktails, soft pretzels and in house baked cookies. Off of the hill and its time to chill, come for a Bloody or beer, and a pretzel right here!
